mapper.select: select * from plan where registDate like '%' || #{registDate} || '%' and teamnum=#{teamNum}
select * from plan where inherence=#{inherence} and teamnum=#{teamNum}
mapper.insert: insert into plan (title, registdate, regtime, context, inherence, teamnum) values (#{title}, #{registDate}, #{regTime}, #{context}, #{inherence}, #{teamNum})
mapper.update: update plan set title=#{title}, registdate=#{registDate}, regtime=#{regTime}, context=#{context} where inherence=#{inherence} and teamnum=#{teamNum}
mapper.delete: delete from plan where inherence=#{inherence} and teamnum=#{teamNum}
